name: Autoprefixer
description: A PostCSS plugin which parses your CSS and adds vendor prefixes

name: Clippy
description: A web tool to make css clip-paths.

name: CSS Diner
description: A fun game to learn and practice CSS selectors.

name: CSS Grid Generator
description: A simple tool to allow you to understand how to use CSS Grids.

name: Image effects with CSS
description: A showcase of image effects that you can apply using purely CSS.
